Class OptionConfiguration

              org.jclif.type.Configuration<OptionMetadata>
                  org.jclif.type.OptionConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,OptionMetadata>
public class OptionConfiguration
extends Configuration<OptionMetadata>

OptionConfiguration class serves as container of all metadata information of an applications expected command line options.

Author:
Stephen Lou Banal <stephen.banal@gmail.com>
See Also:
